description.narrative: In July 2010, a new volunteer program was approved to be implemented in 2011. The Australian Volunteers for International Development (AVID) program brings four programs under a single Australian Government Brand. Funding under this investment provides support for implementation, deployment and management of volunteers within the (AVID) Program by Austraining International (AI). This funding will combine with other AVID funding for the deployment of approximately 210 additional volunteers by 30 June 2011, and will continue to manage the existing approximately 450 volunteers currently in the field. To manage the transition to the implementation of the new program, AI under the AVID program will manage and administer their current volunteers for International Development (VIDA) and the Australian Business Volunteers (ABV) until 30 June 2011 (the end of the contract). The total value of this investment is $5.1 million expensed in the 2010-11 financial year.
